hero.title: The brain behind your business
hero.subtitle: Manage projects, clients, offers, and operations in one hub designed to fit the way you work.

features.title: Why Corteksa?
features.subtitle: We address real user frustrations with clarity, simplicity, and trust. Every feature is designed to make your work easier.

speed.title: Work with clarity.
speed.subtitle: All your tasks, files, and workflows simplified in one place. See your core features in action.

featuresSecondary.unitsDesc: Build the system you need. Create units that fit your business, add details that matter, and connect everything effortlessly.
featuresSecondary.kanbanDesc: Track projects your way. Design workflows with simple Kanban boards to keep every project clear, visible, and on track.
featuresSecondary.docGenDesc: Create documents in one click. Generate contracts, offers, or any document instantly.
featuresSecondary.customFieldsDesc: Add the details that matter to you. Customize every unit with fields that fit your workflow.
featuresSecondary.dashboardDesc: See everything at a glance. Get insights and overview of your projects and operations.

outcomes.title: More features
outcomes.subtitle: We're constantly building new capabilities to help you work smarter. Here's what's on the horizon.

featuresTertiary.taskDesc: Organize and prioritize your work with powerful task tracking and assignments.
featuresTertiary.aiDesc: Smart automation to help you work faster, make better decisions, and save time.
featuresTertiary.omniDesc: Connect with clients across all communication channels in one unified inbox.
featuresTertiary.emailDesc: Connect your email and manage all client communication directly from Corteksa.

logoCloud.title: Trusted by modern operators across industries.
logoCloud.subtitle: From pilot to scale without chaos.

pricing.title: Start free.
pricing.subtitle: Begin with our free plan and upgrade when you need more power. No hidden fees, no surprises.
pricing.moreOptions: Need more options? View our complete pricing plans

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.a1: Corteksa is a flexible workspace to manage projects, clients, and documents in one place. It's designed to be simple yet powerful, adapting to how you work.
faqs.a2: Corteksa is built for businesses that need simplicity without sacrificing flexibility. Whether you're a small team or a growing company, Corteksa fits your workflow.
faqs.a3: Yes! Corteksa offers a free forever plan to get you started. You can upgrade anytime as your needs grow.
faqs.a4: Corteksa supports both Arabic and English interfaces. You can seamlessly switch between languages to work in the one that feels most natural.
faqs.q5: What kind of support do you provide?
faqs.a5: We provide unlimited support because we see ourselves as your partner, not just a tool. Every step you take, we're here to help.

contact.title: Let's build something amazing together
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? We'd love to hear about it. Drop us a line and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.formSubtitle: Fill out the form below and we'll be in touch soon.

about.heroTitle: We're building the future of work
about.heroSubtitle: Corteksa brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one powerful AI-driven platform. We're on a mission to make work more productive and enjoyable for everyone.
about.trustedBy: Trusted by modern operators across industries.
about.storyTitle: From a simple idea to a global platform
about.storyP1: Corteksa started in 2020 with a simple observation: teams were spending more time managing their tools than doing actual work. We knew there had to be a better way.
about.storyP2: Our founders, veterans of the enterprise software industry, set out to build a platform that would truly understand how teams work. Using the latest advances in AI, we created a system that learns and adapts.
about.storyP3: Today, Corteksa serves thousands of teams worldwide, from startups to Fortune 500 companies. But we're just getting started.
about.valuesSubtitle: Our core values guide everything we do
about.valueInnovationDesc: We push boundaries and embrace new ideas to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
about.valueCustomerDesc: Your success is our success. We go above and beyond to exceed expectations.
about.valueTransparencyDesc: Open communication builds trust. We share openly and honestly.
about.teamSubtitle: A passionate team dedicated to transforming how teams work
about.faq1Answer: Corteksa combines AI-powered automation with intuitive design, making it the only CRM that truly adapts to how your team works. Our platform learns from your workflows and suggests optimizations automatically.
about.faq2Answer: We're a fully remote company with team members across North America, Europe, and Asia. Our headquarters is in San Francisco, with satellite offices in London and Singapore.
about.faq3Answer: Yes! We're always looking for talented individuals who share our passion for building great products. Check out our careers page for current openings in engineering, design, and sales.
about.faq4Question: How can I partner with Corteksa?
about.faq4Answer: We love working with partners who share our vision. Whether you're an agency, consultant, or technology company, reach out to partnerships@corteksa.com to explore collaboration opportunities.
about.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of teams already using Corteksa to streamline their operations and boost productivity.

product.heroTitle2: in one workspace built around you
product.heroSubtitle: Discover how it feels to use a system tailored for your need, for construction and property management — a system designed by you, for you.
product.overviewSubtitle: You need a system that brings order to your workflow, replaces scattered tools, and gives you the clarity you've always wanted.
product.unitsDesc: Create units that match the way your business actually works — from clients and projects to site visits, approvals, and more.
product.viewsDesc: See your entire workflow in motion. Every unit automatically comes with a Kanban view that lets you track progress at a glance.
product.fieldsDesc: Use essential field types that keep information clean and consistent: text, numbers, dates, and dropdown selections.
product.relationsDesc: Connect everything with simple one-to-many relationships. Link clients → projects → tasks with clarity and structure.
product.documentsSubtitle: Make the most of your time doing what matters, doing less work on documents.
product.docGenDesc: Create ready-to-send documents with a click. Build your templates once — like price offers, contracts, or reports — then fill in only the details you want, and Corteksa generates the full document instantly.
product.storageDesc: Keep every file organized and easy to find. Upload and store all project and client documents in one place, so you never waste time searching through folders or chats again.
product.collaborationSectionTitle2: no matter how your team works.
product.collaborationSectionSubtitle: Keep everyone aligned with clear tasks, organized communication, and the right permissions — all in one place.
product.collaborationDesc: Assign tasks, mention teammates, track progress — everyone stays aligned without endless meetings or scattered messages.
product.tasksDesc: Assign tasks to team members with clear deadlines and priorities, so everyone knows exactly what to do next.
product.progressDesc: Track the status of work at a glance. See what's done, what's pending, and what's falling behind.
product.discussionDesc: Comment directly on any record to keep conversations organized. Mention teammates to bring them into the discussion instantly — no more scattered WhatsApp messages.
product.timelineDesc: View every action taken on a task or record. Know who did what, when, and how things evolved.
product.permissionsDesc: Control who can access what. Set roles, manage permissions (create, read, update, delete), activate or deactivate users, and assign multiple roles for flexible team management.
product.bestFitSystemDesc: Work feels light, easier, and smoother when you build your own system.
product.bestFitLanguageDesc: Everything in Corteksa is built to feel familiar, comfortable, and truly yours — no translations, no confusion.
product.bestFitPartnerDesc: Corteksa is your growth partner. Real people, real help — available whenever you need clarity, guidance, or a quick answer.
product.assistantSubtitle: Let Cortex AI help you prioritize, suggest actions, and keep your workflow running smoothly.
product.aiCardDesc: Your intelligent assistant that learns how you work. It prioritizes your tasks, suggests next actions, and keeps your workflow moving — so you can focus on what matters.
product.aiPrioritizeDesc: AI analyzes deadlines, dependencies, and workload to suggest the optimal order for your tasks.
product.aiOrganizeDesc: Tasks are automatically categorized, tagged, and sorted — keeping your workspace clean without any manual effort.
product.aiFocusDesc: Get timely nudges on what needs attention right now, based on urgency and your work patterns.
product.aiUserPrompt: Organize my overdue tasks by priority
product.ctaSubtitle: Join teams already using Corteksa to streamline their operations.
product.marketplaceSubtitle: The Corteksa Marketplace is where your tools come together
product.comingSoonSubtitle: We're building the future of work. Here's a preview of what's on the way.
product.comingMarketplaceDesc: Connect the tools you already love. Our marketplace will let you plug in accounting software, communication apps, and third-party services — all unified inside Corteksa without switching tabs.
product.comingAnalyticsDesc: Go beyond dashboards. Deep analytics with custom reports, trend forecasting, and performance benchmarks will give you the clarity to make smarter decisions faster.
product.comingMobileAppDesc: Take your workspace everywhere. A native mobile experience for iOS and Android so you can manage projects, respond to clients, and stay on top of your workflow — wherever you are.
product.comingAutomationDesc: Build powerful workflows without code. Set triggers, conditions, and actions to automate repetitive tasks — from sending notifications to updating statuses and assigning work.
product.comingTimeTrackingDesc: Track every minute that matters. Built-in timers, timesheets, and reports so your team can log hours, bill accurately, and understand where time really goes.
product.comingApiIntegrationsDesc: Build on top of Corteksa. A developer-friendly REST API with webhooks, SDKs, and detailed docs so you can integrate Corteksa into your own systems and workflows.
product.marketplaceDesc: Connect the tools you love. From accounting software to communication apps, our growing marketplace will bring everything together in one unified hub.
product.unitClientHubDesc: All client info, projects, and communications in one place
product.unitProjectWorkflowDesc: Automated task assignments and project templates
product.collabComment1: Updated the draft with new terms
product.supportHelp: Get help from real people who know your workflow
